Draft Rating:

F

Rick Pitino ranks in the 17th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Pitino's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 10 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Paul Pierce with 10th pick but was worth 2th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Ron Mercer with 6th pick but was worth 44th pick.
  • Drafted Jérôme Moïso with 11th pick but was worth 21th pick.

Trade Rating:

B+

Rick Pitino ranks in the 77th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Roy Rogers to BOS.
  • Lost Tony Massenburg, Obinna Ekezie to VAN.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Vitaly Potapenko to BOS.
  • Lost Andrew DeClercq, Andre Miller to CLE.

Signing Rating:

F

Rick Pitino ranks in the 13th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:
  • Signed Tyus Edney in 1997.
  • Signed Adrian Griffin in 1999.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Mark Blount in 2000.
